Class template lock_inverter

boost::interprocess::named_condition::lock_inverter

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/interprocess/sync/named_condition.hpp>

class lock_inverter {

  // construct/copy/destruct

  // public member functions
  void lock();
  void unlock();
};
